channel.title: [Pi] 317 NO DROPS! [RSGP]
channel.description:
I'm willing to pay 10m rsgp for someone to fix everything. They drop nothing not even bones I want monsters to drop bones as none in my server do not just hillies. Please help.
#Hill Giant 117:1 1163:1 1093:1 1247:1 995:1200 892:150 532:1 995:20000

item.title: [Pi] 317 NO DROPS! [RSGP]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Cheap way to make monsters give stuff is

in npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == npcid) {
c.getItems().addItem(item, amount);
}

under public void dropItems(int i) {
